content:
INCOME REPAIR ANALYSIS FOR A HEALTHCARE PROVIDER
SITUATION
▪Client periodically acquired new care centers, and they lacked visibility into the impact on revenue after acquisition due to differences in contractual 
agreements/rates between care centers and insurance providers
▪Merilytics partnered with the client to build a comprehensive report per acquisition to understand the impact on revenue due to the change in 
contractual rates before and after the care center’s acquisition
▪Reconciled the pre and post acquisition revenue by integrating data from different Electronic Medical Record (EMR) systems (gGastro and Athena) and 
Pre-acquisition System data into a single centralized data model which contains the pre & post acquisition contractual rates and billing & collections data
▪Analyzed the post-acquisition revenue realization trends and pro-rated the pre-acquisition rates to estimate the pre-acquisition revenue of the acquired 
care centers where historical data was missing 
▪Assessed Income Gained/Lost due to differences in contractual rates before and after acquiring Care Center at each Insurance type and Insurance plan 
level
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪Achieved an increase in revenue of ~$1.5M which is ~5% of quarterly revenue due to the contractual amendments made with Insurance Providers
▪Breakdown comparison at the Insurance category level helped the client track and make decisions during the contractual discussions with the Insurance 
Providers
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client is a U.S.-based integrated network of gastroenterology care centers that provides services across entire spectrum of gastrointestinal issues
